name: Tsetseg's adventure (itch)
description:
Hey everyone!

I'm starting a new project, Tsetseg's Adventure. It's a 2D pixel arts, retro-style platfomer with cross-stage exploration. Player controls a little witch, Tsetseg, who explores castle, gains skills, and finally defeats the owner of castle, Evil wizard.

So far the game is under early development. The first playable demo, targets release on end of Feb. 2023. Will keep you updated.
